catalysts.thesis: Critical infrastructure play for AI/Data Center power demand; modernization supercycle driving backlog growth.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Q4 Earnings Release (Feb 17, Pre-Market). Smart grid segment expected to outperform on grid hardening demand.
catalysts.absorption_status: Pre-market release; price discovery in early session, not yet fully repriced by institutional flows.
catalysts.risk: Supply chain component shortages impacting margins.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Trading at 18x fwd PE despite 25% EPS growth CAGR; peer group re-rating higher on AI energy narrative.
